title: Marvel Silences Original MCU Avengers Star
description:
One of the Marvel Cinematic Universe‘s most exciting elements is that, in addition to their Avengers films, is that most superhero members often receive their own stand-alone film. For example, 2012’s The Avengers was built upon Iron Man, The Incredible Hulk, Iron Man 2, Thor, and Captain America: The First Avenger. Now one Avengers star [...]
